casebody.data:
Morris D. THOMAS and Ella Thomas v. Mrs. Betty S. FIX. No. 4177. United States Court of Appeals Tenth Circuit. Nov. 8, 1950. Charles R. Nesbitt and Granville Tom-erlin, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellants. Mclnnis, Thompson & Sullivan, Oklahoma City, Okl., for appellee.

Before PHILLIPS, Chief Judge, and BRATTON and HUXMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Appeal dismissed November 8, 1950, on motion of appellants.
